author: sf
msg: kill the threads in the thread pool in a pre-cleanup
This makes sure that the threads are killed when we start destroying
any sub-pools they may be using.

msg: Use maildir when running the app test, easier to debug (JAMES-1495)

msg: Some changes to the README file to simplify it and make it more consistent with the new layout of the OFBiz site.
